title: laucher -.-
body:
I updated but I get this mesaje : Client version 6.13.16_06_24_15_03 is rejected by server. 
wtf riot..!! 
help me plc

replies.body:
This error is generally caused by the local files in your client not passing a version check with the server. This is typically due to the patching process previously failing, and specific assets are missing from the League folder. A common solution is to use the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi) and check the box for 'Force Repatch', then hit 'Start'. This will force your client to patch again, and will likely avoid corruptions or missing files this time around. 

Should you still have issues after trying those steps, let me know.
